UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of Bac7 fragments against drug-resistant clinical isolates.
Literature.Author: Benincasa M, Scocchi M, Podda E, Skerlavaj B, Dolzani L, Gennaro R

Literature.Title: Effect of size and N-terminal residue characteristics on bacterial cell penetration and antibacterial activity of the proline-rich peptide Bac7.
Literature.Author: Guida F, Benincasa M, Zahariev S, Scocchi M, Berti F, Gennaro R, Tossi A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli ML-35(MIC=>128µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>128µM),Serratia marcescens ATCC 8100(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli HB101(MIC=64-128µM)
